memberdef.name: FREAD_SWAP32_CHK
memberdef.initializer: if (fread((dest), 4, 1, fh) != 1) { \ fclose(fh); \ ckd_free(m); \ E_ERROR_SYSTEM("Failed to read %s from %s\n", #dest, filename); \ return NULL; \ } \ if (swap) SWAP_INT32(dest);

memberdef.name: format_desc
memberdef.initializer:
= "BEGIN FILE FORMAT DESCRIPTION
" "int32 n_ciphone; /**< Number of base (CI) phones */
" "int32 n_phone; /**< Number of base (CI) phones + (CD) triphones */
" "int32 n_emit_state; /**< Number of emitting states per phone (0 if heterogeneous) */
" "int32 n_ci_sen; /**< Number of CI senones; these are the first */
" "int32 n_sen; /**< Number of senones (CI+CD) */
" "int32 n_tmat; /**< Number of transition matrices */
" "int32 n_sseq; /**< Number of unique senone sequences */
" "int32 n_ctx; /**< Number of phones of context */
" "int32 n_cd_tree; /**< Number of nodes in CD tree structure */
" "int32 sil; /**< CI phone ID for silence */
" "char ciphones[][]; /**< CI phone strings (null-terminated) */
" "char padding[]; /**< Padding to a 4-bytes boundary */
" "struct { int16 ctx; int16 n_down; int32 pid/down } cd_tree[];
" "struct { int32 ssid; int32 tmat; int8 attr[4] } phones[];
" "int16 sseq[]; /**< Unique senone sequences */
" "int8 sseq_len[]; /**< Number of states in each sseq (none if homogeneous) */
" "END FILE FORMAT DESCRIPTION
"
